post:
bodHOST provides premium, high performance and reliable virtual servers to businesses and individuals. Our main aim is to give customers best bang for the buck, be it security, server performance or up time. To achieve all this we have customized solutions catered to your needs. Our servers are located in Chicago and Montreal with 100% network up time and power availability on a Rock Solid Network.

Check the VPS offers below:
